name: VULKAN AIR ACADEMY
about: At VULKAN AIR ACADEMY, we are dedicated to training professional pilots according to EASA rules and standards. Our highly qualified instructors, who are also experienced pilots, teachers, and examiners, ensure strict compliance with all flight safety rules. We utilize the latest technology and training tools to enhance your skills in piloting and operating aircraft equipment efficiently. Upon completing your training, you can obtain a Ukrainian pilot's license, which can be converted into a European certificate through our international partners. Our commitment is to provide a comprehensive and safe learning environment, preparing you for a successful career in aviation. Join us to embark on your journey to becoming a professional pilot.
services:
["Training of private pilots on the course of PPL (A)
Training of commercial pilots on the CPL (A) course
Obtaining a rating of multi-engine aircraft (ME)
Obtaining a flight rating by instrument (IR)
Night VFR Preparation
Aircraft for rent or free "Time Building""]
